ruleset.name: Apex Structure Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code structure and organization

rule.name: AvoidTrivialPropertyGetters
rule.message: Properties with custom getters that only return a backing field value should use auto-properties or final fields instead
rule.description: Properties with custom getters that only return a field value should use auto-properties or final fields instead. Trivial getters add no value and should be replaced with Apex property syntax, which is more concise and idiomatic.

property.name: xpath
property.value: //Method[ starts-with(@Image, 'get') and @ReturnType != 'void' and count(BlockStatement//ReturnStatement) = 1 and BlockStatement//ReturnStatement/VariableExpression and lower-case(BlockStatement//ReturnStatement/VariableExpression/@Image) = lower-case(substring-after(@Image, 'get')) and not(BlockStatement//MethodCallExpression) and not(BlockStatement//IfBlockStatement) and not(BlockStatement//ForLoopStatement) and not(BlockStatement//WhileLoopStatement) ]
